name: One Shoot
description:
One Shoot is a game made with Unity in 48 hours for the GMTK's 2019 Game Jam. The theme of the jam was "Only One", that's why the player have only one life and  one bullet and the enemies have one life as well. The game was entirely made with one sprite and using only one Unity Scene.

WASD: Move player

Right Mouse Button: Shoot/Recover bullet
